nodes.text: Holo-Sabacc was a variation of sabacc that was played entirely through hologram, without physical cards. It was originally designed by Jar'ga the Hutt to combat rampant cheating and though it became popular, slicers quickly adapted, with stacked holo-decks and sliced holo-sabacc systems easily obtainable on the black market.
Holo-Sabacc appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire during Chapter 13: Profit and Plunder.
